I adore Madonna. I think she is the most talented female singer out there. She has the ability to recreate her self constantly, and she doesn't care what anyone thinks about her. I am not TOO crazy about her newest CD, but I love her older stuff and I will always be a fan.

In my opinion her best songs were "Frozen" and "Ray of Light" although I'm not aware of what all of her songs are

If anyone is looking for a good Madonna greatest hits collection "The Immaculate Collection" is great! It has all her older songs which I think are better than her newer ones. It is a GREAT album! FYI to people who don't know much about Madonna this is a great place to start.

The woman is a mediocre talent, although both her singing and song-writing have improved over the years. I personally I like her better now. She has enough power in the industry to do more interesting stuff than she did when she was younger.
 
 She is however absolutely brilliant at marketing. And incredible business woman. And she is quite beautiful.
 
 As far as singers go though - there are many with better voices - Beyonce, Christina Aguilera, even the ever annoying Maria Carey has a better voice.
 
 My favorite female vocalist is lady named Johnette Napalatino. (She is also plays bass and guitar). She fronts a band called Concrete Blonde (and is about Madonna's age). I have seen her several times. Her voice is from another place. Absolutely astonishing. Whispering in your ear one minute and making your head explode the next. I see 2-6 shows a month and she is hands down the best singer I have ever seen.
Pop music makes me want to puke in my soup, Madonna is no exception. What ever happened to good female artists like Stevie Nicks and Melissa Etheridge?
They are there. Check out Johnette - she is all about rock.
